TaskForm.base_fields = OrderedDict([('name', <django.forms.fields.CharField object at 0xaa9be2c>), ('description', <django.forms.fields.CharField object at 0xa9a1b2c>), ('duration', <django.forms.fields.IntegerField object at 0xa9a14ec>), ('registrations', <django.forms.models.ModelMultipleChoiceField object at 0xaa550cc>), ('registrations_details', <django.forms.fields.CharField object at 0xa9a1e6c>), ('registration_kinds', <django.forms.models.ModelMultipleChoiceField object at 0xa9a176c>), ('registration_kinds_details', <django.forms.fields.CharField object at 0xa9a1c2c>), ('feedback', <django.forms.fields.NullBooleanField object at 0xaa4bb2c>), ('feedback_details', <django.forms.fields.CharField object at 0xaa4b6cc>)])¶
TaskForm.clean()¶

Check for conditional requirements: - If a registration which needs a kind has been checked, make sure the kind is selected - If a registration which needs details has been checked, make sure the details are filled - If a registration_kind which needs details has been checked, make sure the details are filled - If feedback is set to yes, make sure feedback_details has been filled out

TaskForm.declared_fields = OrderedDict()¶

TaskStartForm.base_fields = OrderedDict([('setting', <django.forms.models.ModelMultipleChoiceField object at 0xb02440c>), ('setting_details', <django.forms.fields.CharField object at 0xb024e8c>), ('supervision', <django.forms.fields.NullBooleanField object at 0xb02470c>), ('tasks_number', <django.forms.fields.IntegerField object at 0xb15ce8c>), ('is_copy', <django.forms.fields.BooleanField object at 0xaa9b62c>), ('parent_session', <django.forms.models.ModelChoiceField object at 0xaa9bbec>)])¶
TaskStartForm.clean()¶

Check for conditional requirements: - If a setting which needs details has been checked, make sure the details are filled - If is_copy is True, parent_session is required - If is_copy is False, tasks_number is required

TaskStartForm.declared_fields = OrderedDict([('is_copy', <django.forms.fields.BooleanField object at 0xaa9b62c>), ('parent_session', <django.forms.models.ModelChoiceField object at 0xaa9bbec>)])¶

exception Session.MultipleObjectsReturned¶

Bases: django.core.exceptions.MultipleObjectsReturned

Session.all_tasks_completed()¶
Session.current_task()¶

Returns the current (imcomplete) Task. - If all Tasks are completed, the last Task is returned. - If no Tasks have yet been created, None is returned.
